casebody.data:
Columbus Bar Association v. Larson.

[Cite as Columbus Bar Assn. v. Larson (1991), 60 Ohio St. 3d 133.]

(No. 90-2532 — Submitted February 13, 1991 — Decided May 8, 1991.) Timothy J. Ucker, E. Joel Wesp and Bruce A. Campbell, for relator. David H. Bodiker, for respondent. *134 Per Curiam.

We agree with the board’s findings and recommendation. We hereby publicly reprimand respondent, Steven A. Larson. Costs are taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
